comments.body:
The test is failing because the `RooCustomizer` needs to be deleted first, which is not guaranteed by python. You need to add `del cust` at the end of the script, similar to here:
https://github.com/root-project/root/blob/master/tutorials/roofit/rf207_comptools.py#L113

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +94,98 @@    "\nThe following leafs have been used while customising\n\t(partial overlap with the set of automatically created leaves.\n\ta new customiser for a different PDF could reuse them if necessary.):"
)
allCustomiserNodes.Print("V")

del cust
